name: ancient-brass-dragon-xmm
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of ancient-brass-dragon-xmm, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of ancient-brass-dragon-xmm with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Create a detailed concept art image infused with aquatic fantasy realism. The style should be painterly, with no aspects of modern technology or signage, and should adhere to a consistent three-color palette of teals, deep blues, and sea greens, highlighted with pearl. The scene is set in a merged zone of underwater and sky. Include the figure of an ancient brass dragon, accentuating its musculature and unique limbs, as well as bioluminescent accents. Make sure to illustrate a human silhouette for scale. The materials should be reminiscent of grounded medieval fantasy with culturally coherent gear and hints of subsurface caustics. You should also depict a sense of motion in the scene, with a focus on the effect of pressure-dome materials under water. Note: Avoid rendering any embedded text or gibberish strings as well as sci-fi User Interfaces, modern signage, photorealistic CGI, anime style, and bloom glare.
